name: Retro Wars: Episode IV 1/4
overview: Amiga Game: RetroWars Episode IV 1/4 (2018): The release of multi-language versions:, French, German and English, along the Spanish version 1.4 the release of the boxed commercial version, leads us to bring here and now this great and fun AmigaWave game. A graphic adventure in a very distant galaxy but with funny dialogues, well done caricatures and very well finished. Turn yourself into Luk, followed by your droids and his master, in order to escape from the planet and the negative influence of retro-speculation, promoted by the dark side.
